p: Seventy-two BALB/c mice weighing 25 ± 3 g were prepared. The mice had free access to water and pelleted feed for rodents (Javaneh Khorasan Company, Khorasan, Iran). The mice were kept in an ambient temperature of 23 ± 3 °C, at a constant air humidity, and a natural day–night cycle. This study was approved by the Animal Research Committee of the Urmia Islamic Azad University with ethical No. IAU-UB 11044.
